declaration.code: init(id: String, donationLimit: Tips.DonationLimit) where DonationInfo == Tips.EmptyDonation

overview:
### Creating an event

Create an event when you want display a tip based on an action that can occur one or more times in your app (such as a user logging in). Then use [doc://com.apple.TipKit/documentation/TipKit/Tips/Event/donate()] to donate to the event when the action occurs, increasing the event count by one.

### Adding event rules

Add tip display rules using the `#Rule` macro to prevent a tip from being displayed until an event has been donated a specific number of times.
